prompt:
You are a medical consultation expert.
Your task is to create NEW medical consultation Q&A pairs that follow the same format and style as the examples below.

INSTRUCTIONS:
1. Generate COMPLETELY NEW scenarios (not copies of examples)
2. Match the format, style, and quality exactly as shown in the examples
3. Provide clear, detailed doctor responses
4. Cover different medical topics if possible

EXAMPLES (study the format carefully):

================================================================================
Example 1:
================================================================================
DESCRIPTION: my cheek feels sore after placing a temporary bridge why

PATIENT: hi doctor I had a tooth extraction and a temporary bridge on my back upper teeth the temporary bridge broke and I got another one after this I started to have some soreness in my left cheek and left side of my tongue my cheek feels swollen and sore I noticed two white bumps on the inner side of my cheek today is this from the dental work or something else

DOCTOR: hi for further information consult a dentist online

STATUS: low severity

================================================================================
Example 2:
================================================================================
DESCRIPTION: after cleaning my ears with buds I experience watery discharge with pain is this dangerous

PATIENT: hello doctor I would like to ask about my situation last night I decided to clean my ears using cotton buds after hours I felt like my left ear did not function as how my right ear does it has the same feeling when you got out of the water from the swimming pool as if there is a stucked water inside days pass two days to be exact I started to feel pain whenever I touch my ear and also I observe that there are times wherein there is a liquid just a bit but not too much that comes out of my ear but it has no odor and color I feel scared and bothered I am afraid of losing my hearing since I mostly use my ears for my job please help me is this dangerous will I lose my hearing because of this what are the medications I can take to ease the pain and cure this problem

DOCTOR: hello I understand your situation your symptoms are suggestive of an acute ear infection nothing to worry since you say your ear is discharging follow these suggestions visit an ent doctor near you so that your ear can be visualized endoscopically and treated accordingly if you do not have the chance to visit an ent consultant start yourself on the following medication tablet amoxicillin 500 my twice daily for five days tablet levocetirizine once daily before sleep for five days ciprofloxacin ear drops three drops thrice daily try to keep your ear dry at all times regarding your hearing in most cases it will be back to normal after the underlying infection subsides but nothing can be confirmed without examining your ear get out of the habit of using earbuds to clean your ear it is designed to only clean the outer ear lobe not to clean inside your ear this habit will only worsen things for you infection of the external or middle ear endoscopic examination of the ear pure tone audiometry impudence audiometry keep the ear dry at all times follow up regarding the symptoms in three days

STATUS: medium severity

================================================================================
Example 3:
================================================================================
DESCRIPTION: how to cure a boil in vagina

PATIENT: hi doctor I have a boil near my vagina I had it for a week and it did not cause any discomfort but from yesterday it is causing some discomfort I do not feel any pain during urination kindly recommend a cure

DOCTOR: hello I had gone through all the details posted revert back with the answers to an internal medicine physician online

STATUS: medium severity

================================================================================
NOW: Generate a NEW unique medical consultation scenario following the EXACT same format above:

DESCRIPTION: [brief medical question]
PATIENT: [detailed patient narrative]
DOCTOR: [clear, detailed medical advice - write naturally, don't worry about formatting]
STATUS: [low severity / medium severity / high severity]

Generate ONLY the new scenario, no meta-commentary.
api_response:
DESCRIPTION: my toddler has red spots on hands and feet after fever should I worry

PATIENT: hello doctor my 2 year old daughter had high fever for three days which just broke yesterday today I noticed small red spots appearing on her palms and soles they look like flat red dots and don't seem to itch she's eating normally but seems more tired than usual I'm worried this might be something serious like meningitis or an allergic reaction she goes to daycare so I'm concerned about contagious illnesses too should I take her to emergency or can this wait until morning what could this be

DOCTOR: hello based on your description this sounds like hand foot and mouth disease which is common in young children the pattern of fever followed by rash on hands feet and often in the mouth is characteristic this viral illness is usually self limiting and resolves within 7 10 days ensure she stays hydrated with plenty of fluids offer soft foods if she has mouth sores you can give paracetamol for any discomfort if she develops difficulty breathing severe headache neck stiffness or dehydration signs like decreased urination then visit emergency immediately otherwise schedule an appointment with your pediatrician for confirmation keep her home from daycare until all blisters have dried to prevent spread to other children hand foot and mouth disease supportive care with fluids and rest monitor for complications like dehydration or neurological symptoms follow up if symptoms worsen or new symptoms appear

STATUS: medium severity
